# llm-rpc

A Python package for LLM RPC operations

## Installation

```bash
uv pip install llm-rpc
# or
pip install llm-rpc
```

## Usage

```python
import llm_rpc

# Your code here
```

## Development

```bash
# Install in development mode with uv
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

# Run tests
uv run pytest

# Format code
uv run black src tests

# Type check
uv run mypy src
```

## Building and Publishing

```bash
# Build the package
uv build

# Publish to PyPI
uv publish
```
